name: The Black Arts
description: The Black Arts Company (born in February 2011) is involved in brand development, advertising, promotion as well as digital, event and visual media production. We are only interested in the strategic and commercial success of our work. We produce, in-house, all our live, film and visual assets work. We don’t expect our work to be delivered in any way that doesn’t reflect its creative quality or more importantly enhance the appeal and enduring reputation of our client’s brand.
